title: Exploring Music in Spain
curator: Gilda Gitto, Serena Sciortino, Vito Antonio Miccoli

dynamic_elements.chart_query:
SELECT DISTINCT (year(xsd:dateTime(?date)) as ?label)  (COUNT(?label) AS ?count)
WHERE {
     ?band ?a wd:Q5741069 . # rock band 
     ?band wdt:P495 wd:Q29 . # from Spain
     ?band wdt:P2031 ?date . # formation year         
     SERVICE wikibase:label { bd:serviceParam wikibase:language "en".
          ?band rdfs:label ?label.
      }

}

GROUP BY ?count ?date
ORDER BY ?label
LIMIT 20

dynamic_elements.table_query:
SELECT DISTINCT ?theatre ?theatreLabel ?image 
WHERE { ?theatre wdt:P31 wd:Q24354; # istanza di teatro 
                 wdt:P17 wd:Q29. # si trova in Spagna
       OPTIONAL { ?theatre wdt:P18 ?image . } 
       SERVICE wikibase:label { bd:serviceParam wikibase:language "[AUTO_LANGUAGE],en" } } 
LIMIT 10 
OFFSET 10
